title: After Being Abandoned, I Realized That I Had Reincarnated - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Shoujo Ai
tags: Adventurers   Child Protagonist   Fairies   Fantasy World   Magic   Male to Female   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World
author: ウィン
description:
A girl was branded as useless after it was found out that she had no magical powers, so she was abandoned in a forest.

Due to some bad luck, she ended up falling down a cliff and was seriously injured.

However, the impact made her recover the memories of her past life.

This is a story about one who tries their best to survive in a different world.>
